meta_title: Shriram Multi Asset Allocation Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Shriram Multi Asset Allocation Fund Direct   Growth is Multi Asset Allocation Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of null/10. It has track record of 1 years, with three year return of null. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: Shriram Multi Asset Allocation Fund Direct   Growth
exit_load: Exit Load for units in excess of 12% of the investment,1% will be charged for redemption within 90 days.
description: The scheme seeks to generate long term capital appreciation with inflation beating returns by investing in Equity and Equity related securities, Debt and Money Market instruments, Gold/Silver ETFs, and REITs / InvITs. There is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.

analysis.analysis_desc: 1Y annualised returns higher than category average by 3.79%

amc_info.name: Shriram Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 511-512, Meadows, Sahar Plaza,J. B. Nagar, Andheri (East), Mumbai 400059
amc_info.description: Shriram Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 05/12/1994 and its managing total assets of Rs.43 Cr. Its ranked at 40 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2016.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
